类 ArchitectureController

java.lang.Object
com.example.comp20300javafxproject.ArchitectureController
public class ArchitectureController extends Object
The Controller of JavaFx Project

    • isScoreBoardReady

      private boolean isScoreBoardReady
      Whether the 30 Labels that make up the scoreboard have been added to the corresponding 3 ArrayList.

      The scoreboard is made up of 30 Labels, with 10 Labels showing the names of the 10 top players, 10 Labels showing the number of wins by the 10 top players, and 10 Labels showing the number of squares moved by the 10 top players.

      When the showPreviousRecord() method and showNewWholeRecords() method are executed, the 30 Labels in the ArrayList will set the specific values of the records in turn and display them on the scoreboard.

    • showedPreviousRecord

      private boolean showedPreviousRecord
      Whether the score board already shows the previous results. True means that it was shown.

      When the "Start" button or "Show Record" button is clicked, the previous records will be shown.

    • tenApexGamersName

      private ArrayList<javafx.scene.control.Label> tenApexGamersName
      It stores 10 Labels with the names of 10 top players

    • tenApexGamersWins

      private ArrayList<javafx.scene.control.Label> tenApexGamersWins
      It stores 10 Labels with the number of wins by the 10 top players

    • tenApexGamersMoves

      private ArrayList<javafx.scene.control.Label> tenApexGamersMoves
      It stores 10 Labels with the number of squares moved by the 10 top players

  • 构造器详细资料

    • ArchitectureController

      public ArchitectureController()
      initialize the 3 ArrayList that stores the 30 Labels of the scoreboard, initialize the game

  • 方法详细资料

    • setTenApexGamersName

      public void setTenApexGamersName()
      Put the 10 top player name labels into the ArrayList

    • setTenApexGamersWins

      public void setTenApexGamersWins()
      Put the 10 top player wins labels into the ArrayList

      public void setTenApexGamersMoves()
      Put the 10 top player moves labels into the ArrayList

    • setPlayerTurn

      public void setPlayerTurn(javafx.scene.shape.Circle player)
      Show the name of the player who should move this turn

      Player one is shown in blue and player two is shown in red

      参数:
      player - player 1 or player 2

    • initAfterFinish

      public void initAfterFinish()
      Initialize some content, execute this method after a player wins.

      Initialize the text of the two name input boxes and other game information (direction of movement, number of squares to move, etc.).

      Initialize Game.state to the very beginning of the game - Game.NOT_READY

    • updatePlayerMoves

      public void updatePlayerMoves(javafx.scene.shape.Circle player)
      Update the number of moving squares for different players
      参数:
      player - player 1 or player 2

    • playerOneDir

      void playerOneDir(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Player 1 throws a die to obtain the direction of movement.

      Step1: Player 1 throws the dice. If the result is not `miss`, the state is updated to Game.PLAYERONE_MOVE.

      Step2: If the result is `miss`

      - If player 2 is stuck in the tar pit, update state to Game.PLAYERONE_DICE.

      - Otherwise, the state is updated to Game.PLAYERTWO_DICE.

      参数:
      event - Hit the "Direction" button of player 1

    • playerOneMove

      void playerOneMove(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is executed if the "Move" button of player 1 is hit and the state is Game.PLAYERONE_MOVE.

      Step1: Player 1 gets the "ideal" number of squares moved as determined by dice, execute Game.move(Gamer, DirDice, MoveDice) method.

      Step2: check current state

      - Game.SOMEONE_WON: will execute Game.doPersistentRecord(Gamer) method in Game.playerOneMoveSecondly(), Gamer param is PlayerOne. execute showNewWholeRecords() method. execute initAfterFinish() method. Set the state to Game.NOT_READY

      - Game.PLAYERONE_CHOOSING: update some info and wait for the "Left"/"Right"/"Miss" button to be hit

      - else: If player 1 was stuck in tar pit, update state to Game.PLAYERTWO_DICE. If player 2 was stuck in tar pit, update state to Game.PLAYERONE_DICE.

      参数:
      event - Hit the "Move" button of player 1

    • playerOneLeft

      void playerOneLeft(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is executed if the "Left" button of player 1 is hit and the state is Game.PLAYERONE_CHOOSING.

      Step1: execute Game.moveLeftOrRight(Gamer, DirDice, MoveDice, int) method, Gamer param is PlayerOne.

      Step2: If player 1 was stuck in tar pit, update state to Game.PLAYERTWO_DICE. If player 2 was stuck in tar pit, update state to Game.PLAYERONE_DICE.

      参数:
      event - Hit the "Left" button of player 1

    • playerOneMiss

      void playerOneMiss(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is executed if the "Miss" button of player 1 is hit and the state is Game.PLAYERONE_CHOOSING.

      Step1: update state to Game.PLAYERTWO_DICE

      Step2: If player 1 was stuck in tar pit, update state to Game.PLAYERTWO_DICE. If player 2 was stuck in tar pit, update state to Game.PLAYERONE_DICE.

      参数:
      event - Hit the "Miss" button of player 1

    • playerOneRight

      void playerOneRight(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is executed if the "Right" button of player 1 is hit and the state is Game.PLAYERONE_CHOOSING.

      Step1: execute Game.moveLeftOrRight(Gamer, DirDice, MoveDice, int) method, Gamer param is PlayerOne.

      Step2: If player 1 was stuck in tar pit, update state to Game.PLAYERTWO_DICE. If player 2 was stuck in tar pit, update state to Game.PLAYERONE_DICE.

      参数:
      event - Hit the "Right" Button of player 1

    • playerTwoDir

      void playerTwoDir(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Player 2 throws a die to obtain the direction of movement.

      Step1: Player 2 throws the dice. If the result is not `miss`, the state is updated to Game.PLAYERTWO_MOVE.

      Step2: If the result is `miss`

      - If player 1 is stuck in the tar pit, update state to Game.PLAYERTWO_DICE.

      - Otherwise, the state is updated to Game.PLAYERONE_DICE.

      参数:
      event - Hit the "Direction" Button of player 2

    • PlayerTwoMove

      void PlayerTwoMove(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is executed if the "Move" button of player 2 is hit and the state is Game.PLAYERTWO_MOVE.

      Step1: Player 2 gets the "ideal" number of squares moved as determined by dice, execute Game.move(Gamer, DirDice, MoveDice) method.

      Step2: check current state

      - Game.SOMEONE_WON: execute Game.doPersistentRecord(Gamer) method in Game.playerTwoMoveSecondly(), Gamer param is PlayerTwo. execute showNewWholeRecords() method. execute initAfterFinish() method. Set the state to Game.NOT_READY

      - Game.PLAYERONE_CHOOSING: update some info and wait for the "Left"/"Right"/"Miss" button to be hit

      - else: If player 1 was stuck in tar pit, update state to Game.PLAYERTWO_DICE. If player 2 was stuck in tar pit, update state to Game.PLAYERONE_DICE.

      参数:
      event - Hit the "Move" Button of player 2

    • playerTwoLeft

      void playerTwoLeft(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is executed if the "Left" button of player 2 is hit and the state is Game.PLAYERTWO_CHOOSING.

      Step1: execute Game.moveLeftOrRight(Gamer, DirDice, MoveDice, int) method, Gamer param is PlayerTwo.

      Step2: If player 1 was stuck in tar pit, update state to Game.PLAYERTWO_DICE. If player 2 was stuck in tar pit, update state to Game.PLAYERONE_DICE.

      参数:
      event - Hit the "Left" button of player 2

    • playerTwoMiss

      void playerTwoMiss(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is executed if the "Miss" button of player 2 is hit and the state is Game.PLAYERTWO_CHOOSING.

      Step1: update state to Game.PLAYERONE_DICE

      Step2: If player 1 was stuck in tar pit, update state to Game.PLAYERTWO_DICE. If player 2 was stuck in tar pit, update state to Game.PLAYERONE_DICE.

      参数:
      event - Hit the "Miss" button of player 2

    • playerTwoRight

      void playerTwoRight(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is executed if the "Right" button of player 2 is hit and the state is Game.PLAYERTWO_CHOOSING.

      Step1: execute Game.moveLeftOrRight(Gamer, DirDice, MoveDice, int) method, Gamer param is PlayerTwo.

      Step2: If player 1 was stuck in tar pit, update state to Game.PLAYERTWO_DICE. If player 2 was stuck in tar pit, update state to Game.PLAYERONE_DICE.

      参数:
      event - Hit the "Right" Button of player 2

    • startGame

      void startGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      When the game is in the NOT_READY state, the game can start after clicking "Start" if all the player name input fields have non-empty/non-all-space names entered.
      参数:
      event - Hit the "Start" Button

    • showPreviousRecord

      public void showPreviousRecord()
      This method is executed if the "Show Record" button is hit and showedPreviousRecord is false.

      execute Game.getPreviousGamers() method, show the previous game records stored in ArrayList of Game.previousGamers

    • showNewWholeRecords

      public void showNewWholeRecords()
      This method will be executed after a player wins.

      Show the updated game records stored in ArrayList of Game.previousGamers

    • clearRecord

      void clearRecord(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Clear the history of game score board and reset the info of game score board

      Step1: execute Game.doClearRecord() method

      Step2: reset the info of game score board

      参数:
      event - Hit the "Clear Record" Button
